resetPassword.title: Reset Your Password
resetPassword.p1.guidingText: To reset your password, enter your portal account username.
resetPassword.p2.guidingText: Please answer at least three security questions correctly to reset your password.
resetPassword.p2.question1.label: Question One
resetPassword.p2.question2.label: Question Two
resetPassword.p2.question3.label: Question Three
resetPassword.p3.guidingText: Create a new password to access the portal.
resetPassword.p3.newPassword.label: New Password
resetPassword.p3.confirmPassword.label: Confirm Password
resetPassword.p3.securePassword.error: The password is not secure enough
